items.description: Save keystrokes in the terminal, but -unlike aliases- without forgetting the full command or making your history unintelligible
items.title: zsh-abbr

items.description: A beautiful, accelerated Git status zsh theme with a high data-to-ink ratio, dynamic content, and dynamic styles
items.title: Hometown Prompt

items.description: Make the maintenance of long-lived branches painless by tracking branch relationships as code and automating rebase/merge workflows
items.title: git-replay

items.description: Have an idea for a custom zsh theme that includes Git info, but you use Hometown or p10k for their speed? Use Git Prompt Kit components
items.title: Git Prompt Kit

items.description: Light weight dependable tests and coverage reports for zsh software. Use it for csh, ksh, and sh too
items.title: zsh-test-runner

items.description: Keep on top of your terminal tabs by titling each after its directory, its directory's parent, and its ongoing command if one is running
items.title: zsh-window-title
